Trulia - San Francisco | Full Time

Senior Data Platform Engineer

We are looking for someone with a DBA background who has transitioned into big data sql such as hive/presto/impala/etc. Our Data Platform team is new and small so you will have a big impact. Our data platform is a modern mix of Kafka, Hive, Storm, Hadoop, Spark with a more traditional mysql replication hierarchy for parts of it. Great company to work for with great people.

https://boards.greenhouse.io/trulia/jobs/113237
